name: Paranormal Sighting
description:
This is a haunted house.

Some objects are possessed and are different from the original form.

Find them with the help of the house model that shows how the house and furnitures should look like.

Press LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to look at the model.

Press RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON when checking the model to check the interior.

Press SHIFT when looking at an object that does't seem quite right to you. If the object is possessed, it will flash blue.

Credit:

Hand Model, Tree Model - Jacob Dunn

House Model, House Interior - Synty Studio

Designer - Shimin Sun

Programmer - Shimin Sun
